message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation
I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage, but your offer was a bit too skewed. Let's be reasonable.
Considering the inflation, I've made a slight adjustment. This is as fair as it gets.
Time is ticking and the value is decreasing. This offer is a compromise, take it before inflation eats further into our potential gains.
I understand your urgency, but I still think I can get a better deal. Inflation hurts you more than me.
Alice, this is my final offer.  The clock is ticking and we're both losing out.  I'm willing to be fair, but I won't be taken advantage of.
